packageFormat.name: NavMesh
packageFormat.description: Contains the navigation mesh of the map.
packageFormat.field: The CRC-32 checksum of the walkability grid that this navmesh is based on.
The width of the walkability grid that this navmesh is based on.
The height of the walkability grid that this navmesh is based on.
Contains an RC.Engine.Maps.NavMeshVertexList package.
Contains an RC.Engine.Maps.NavMeshNodeList package.

packageFormat.name: NavMeshVertexList
packageFormat.description: Describes the coordinates of the vertices of a navmesh. These integers shall be interpreted as the bits of RCNumbers.
packageFormat.field: The list of integers that describes the bits of the X-coordinates of the vertices.
The list of integers that describes the bits of the Y-coordinates of the vertices.

packageFormat.name: NavMeshNodeList
packageFormat.description: Describes the nodes of a navmesh.
packageFormat.field: The integers in this list address the vertices of the appropriate node from the vertex list. The nodes are delimited by -1 numbers.
